title: Mr. Tanaka's perspective on school uniforms

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

School debate
content.question: Why does Mr. Tanaka like school uniforms?

choices.label: They eliminate the need to choose clothes.

content.answer: They eliminate the need to choose clothes.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
